Hoji Ya Henda Braga Fortuna (a mụrụ na 4 Septemba 1974) bụ onye Angola na-eme ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ ya na Luanda ma gụọ ya aha dike agha Hoji-ya-Henda, Fortuna kwagara Portugal mgbe ọ dị afọ 20
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka ihe nlereanya na DJ n'otu oge ọ na-amụ iwu na Mahadum Katọlik nke Portugal na Porto, ma mesịa malite ime ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2008, ọ sooro onye ya na ya bụzi nwunye ya, onye na-ede akwụkwọ njem Anja Mutic, ibi na New York.

Fortuna apụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, TV na ihe nkiri kemgbe afọ 2001, na-enweta ụfọdụ onye ama ama na Portugal maka ịpụta na ọ dịkarịa ala usoro telivishọn iri n'ebe ahụ. Ọ natara Africa Movie Academy Award dịka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka ọrụ ya dịka onye omekome César na ihe nkiri Congolese Viva Riva!. N'afọ 2013, a tụbara ya ka ọ pụta na ọrụ nkwado na oge nke anọ nke usoro ihe nkiri HBO fantasy Game of Thrones
